comments: First bit in fractional part of binary expansion of square root of n.
formula: Runs are 0^1, 0^2 1, 0^3 1^2, 0^4 1^3, ...a(n) = 1 iff n >= 3 and n is in the interval [k*(k+1) + 1, ..., k*(k+1) + k] for some k >= 1.a(n) = floor(2*sqrt(n))-2*floor(sqrt(n)). [Mircea Merca, Jan 31 2012]
mathematica: Array[ Function[ n, RealDigits[ N[ Power[ n, 1/2 ], 10 ], 2 ]// (#[ [ 1, #[ [ 2 ] ]+1 ] ])& ], 110 ]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Olivier GÃ©rard_
extensions: Revised by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Mar 20 2003.
